task.title: How do I link a new document into the shared DITA repository on Webserve?
task.shortdesc: Creating topicref links for a new document in the shared DITA repository

taskbody.prereq: You must have created a new document in the dmm3 subfolder.

steps.stepsection: You first need to create a topicref to define a key for the document. This key controls what domains the document will be accessible from.

step.cmd: In the Oxygen project, in the dmm3 subfolder, open the ditamap corresponding to the domain that the document belongs in.
Inside the map, insert a topicref element with keys and href attributes, making the keys attribute equal to the docid and the href attribute equal to the filename of the referenced topic.
step.stepxmp: E.g., for document ddud, <topicref keys="ddud" href="ddud.dita">

step.cmd: Inside the reltable, insert a relrow. Inside the relrow, insert three relcell elements:

substep.note: The first relcell contains the "source document"; i.e., the document from which the links originate.
substep.cmd: Insert a topicref with a keyref attribute equal to the keys attribute of the topicref you created in the domain ditamap in Step 2 above.

substep.note: The second relcell contains links to Refs.
substep.cmd: Insert a topicref for each Ref of the origin document. In each topicref, insert a keyref attribute equal to the keys attribute of the topicref element for each Ref. If the origin document has no Refs, insert an empty topicref element as a placeholder.

substep.note: The third relcell contains links to Hotitems.
substep.cmd: Insert a topicref for each referenced Hotitem in the origin document. In each topicref, insert a keyref attribute equal to the keys attribute of the topicref element for each Hotitem. If the origin document has no Hotitems, insert an empty topicref element as a placeholder.

step.stepxmp:
E.g., for document aaaa, which has refs bbbb and cccc and no hotitems:
<relrow> <relcell> <topicref keyref="aaaa"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref keyref="bbbb"/> <topicref keyref="cccc"/> </relcell> <relcell/> </relrow>

taskbody.result: The new document is linked in.
